channel.title: My Awesome pvp server!
channel.description:
[center] --- Need Banner ---[/center]
Hey guys, this is a project I've been working in my free time. I have not yet though of a server name, any suggestions?
This is currently a pvp server where you would need coins to spawn which can be earned completing achievements, selling items etc. There is also a token system which are gained by killing players. Tokens can be spent in shop to buy items such as vesta's and godswords etc. There has been a lot of though put into this server. If you would like to contribute to the development just let me know :)
[center][u][size=14pt]Features[/size][/u] 95% Melee combat 90% Range 80% Magic 100% Duel arena 100% Jad (currently one wave, I have got all the waves added coded in) 99% Fight pits (Just a tiny bug that needs fixing) [s]50% Clan wars (red, white portals are fully functional). Working on Purple portal with all modes and maps.[/s] 90% Clan Wars - All portals work properly, purple portal has maps, rules etc working. TODO: Add barrier 100% clan chat with ranks and more Start on Godwars, all bosses are fully coded with NPC text and locations. Coins to spawn items 90% Special Attacks 100% ancients spells 100% modern spells Only have vengance for Lunar magic :( Mithril Seeds Safe/hot spot icons PVP timer is still being worked on. Found configs and clientscript ID's Level differences Safe PK and dangerous PK spots Most multizones added Start on Music system 100% Private Messaging [s]20% Following[/s] 90% Following A blue dot will appear on mini map if a player is wearing the same team cape a you. Level differences overlay has been added with a temporary level difference system. I will have differences to be exactly like how RuneScape had handled theirs (10% combat level + 5 + wild level). Lootshare is now in-progress currently 5% Some minor and major bug fixes
--- And much more!! ---
I have been working on this alone! Nobody to help :/
[center][u][size=14pt]Some pointless Media :p[/size][/u] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/5382ju5l7/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/648b8ymkr/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/evaqphgi3/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/49vgr7zkb/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/v8zbmdm17/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/pomubqn63/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/cn15lvyrv/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/xazt0mk0b/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/43hro4qff/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/6ie8maw23/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/qyp94j6bv/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/83ox0dgwb/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/ij4a0rsuj/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/58btticwb/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/wco1c2w23/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/8x646qcaz/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/6nhzvz3d7/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/xu9hnn0sr/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/clvt67mbv/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/npaty2i8b/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/7bquex22z/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/b0l4s51hn/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/n3qgfpcjv/image.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/hcvoo8f63/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dceikk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/29ygo3l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/fyzfyq.png[/img]
Tell me what you guys think :)
[iurl=#top]Back to top[/iurl] [/center]

item.title: My Awesome pvp server!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Updates:

  • Almost (near perfect?) following (at last! :P)
  • Updated the hot keys like the 600+ versions (this was actually hard to work out since it didn’t revolve much around KeyEvent and it’s 100x different to how 317 clients had it handled.)
  • Couple bug fixes
  • Improved combat
  • Almost completed clan wars

Currently working on:

  • Random drops depending on carried net wealth

Considering adding summoning into game, should I? What do you guys think?

Read full topic

item.title: My Awesome pvp server!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Fails:

seems to me as if she(?) has some knowledge in java. however, i will say this - it looks like you’re just ripping content from other servers. there’s nothing new and/or exciting, that being said, there’s definitely not a lot of thought being put-forth. either that, or you just lack imagination.

I had actually started of as a 474 server starting from a blank rs2hd server. Most of the content listed was from the server being a 474 version. Combat was fully written from scratch when I decided to go pvp I then upgraded then upgraded to 525 because the conversion was extremely easy because of the 525 rs2hd server. It’s now a 530 server because I decided to reference xenorune on how it handled some of its content. The only thing I ripped is duel arena and pits. Jad was not in xenorune and I’ve got all 63 waves coded

Having said that if you look back to rs2hd and xenorune most of the content I listed came with the these servers. For those saying this doesn’t look special or there’s nothing new… well what do you expect its a pvp server.

Read full topic

In all honesty, it doesn’t really seem like you know what you’re doing. And not a lot of thought has been put into this. What Java do you actually know?[/quote]
seems to me as if she(?) has some knowledge in java. however, i will say this - it looks like you’re just ripping content from other servers. there’s nothing new and/or exciting, that being said, there’s definitely not a lot of thought being put-forth. either that, or you just lack imagination.

The Web Guy:

And under features, how much of this did you do.

item.title: My Awesome pvp server!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Just some quick updates:

  • A blue dot will appear on mini map if a player is wearing the same team cape a you.
  • Level differences overlay has been added with a temporary level difference system. I will have differences to be exactly like how RuneScape had handled theirs (10% combat level + 5 + wild level).
  • Lootshare is now in-progress currently 5%
  • Some minor and major bug fixes



More coming soon!

Read full topic

item.title: My Awesome pvp server!
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:11, topic:528276”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=647024.msg4351350#msg4351350 date=1376693981]

This is currently a pvp server where you would need coins to spawn which can be earned completing achievements, selling items etc. There is also a token system which are gained by killing players. Tokens can be spent in shop to buy items such as vesta’s and godswords etc.

Is this what you consider, “a lot of thought.”

In all honesty, it doesn’t really seem like you know what you’re doing. And not a lot of thought has been put into this. What Java do you actually know? And under features, how much of this did you do.

Nonetheless, good luck.

Does this look like a fudgeing 317 to you? Go find me a real 530 with near completed combat, following, let alone 100% ancients and modern spells working. I’ve almost got full clan wars too. The only other 530 I can think of is xenorune.
[/quote]

Calm down, bud. You don’t have any Java experience and you know it. Good luck.[/quote]
rofl.

Read full topic
